languages.text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Следующая атака ассасина, направленная в одиночную цель, проходит со штрафом −50% к пробитию брони (этот показатель не может стать меньше 0) и получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Если это атака в ближнем бою, цель повернется на 180 градусов. Ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} при атаке ассасина будут равны 0% до начала следующего хода цели.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Если это дистанционная атака, цель будет перемещена на ближайшую клетку в радиусе 3 клеток так, чтобы от атак ассасина ее не защищало {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}. При движении цель смогут атаковать по возможности.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 lethality.
- If it's a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's dodge and parry against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0 until the start of this enemy's turn.
- If it's a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent cover facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.

The next Assassin's single-target attack will have a -50% armour penetration penalty, with minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 lethality.
- If that attack is melee, its target rotates for 180 degrees. The enemy's dodge and parry against that Assassin's attack is equal to 0 until the start of this enemy's turn.
- If this attack is ranged, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent covers against the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.

The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

languages.text:
Следующая атака ассасина, направленная в одиночную цель, проходит со штрафом −50% к пробитию брони (этот показатель не может стать меньше 0) и получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Если это атака в ближнем бою, цель повернется на 180 градусов. Ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} при атаке ассасина будут равны 0% до начала следующего хода цели.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Если это дистанционная атака, цель будет перемещена на ближайшую клетку в радиусе 3 клеток так, чтобы от атак ассасина ее не защищало {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}. При движении цель смогут атаковать по возможности.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Следующая атака ассасина, направленная в одиночную цель, проходит со штрафом −50% к пробитию брони (этот показатель не может стать меньше 0) и получает +10 к летальности.
- Если это атака в ближнем бою, цель повернется на 180 градусов. Ее уклонение и парирование при атаке ассасина будут равны 0 до начала следующего хода цели.
- Если это дистанционная атака, цель будет перемещена на ближайшую клетку в радиусе 3 клеток так, чтобы от атак ассасина ее не защищало укрытие. При движении цель смогут атаковать по возможности.

Следующая атака ассасина, направленная в одиночную цель, проходит со штрафом −50% к пробитию брони (этот показатель не может стать меньше 0) и получает +10 к летальности.
- Если это атака в ближнем бою, цель повернется на 180 градусов. Ее уклонение и парирование при атаке ассасина будут равны 0 до начала следующего хода цели.
- Если это дистанционная атака, цель будет перемещена на ближайшую клетку в радиусе 3 клеток так, чтобы от атак ассасина ее не защищало укрытие. При движении цель смогут атаковать по возможности.

languages.text:
刺客的下次单体攻击会遭受-50%的护甲穿透减值，最低可降至0%，但获得10点{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}加成。
- <indent=5%>如果此次攻击为近战攻击，该目标会旋转180度。该名敌人对刺客攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}会降低至0，效果持续至该名敌人回合开始。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果此次攻击为远程攻击，目标将会前往3格距离内的最近格子，且此格子在面向刺客的方向不会有邻近{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}。此次移动会引发借机攻击。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
刺客的下次单体攻击会遭受-50%的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，最低降至0%，但获得10点致命加成。
- 如果此次攻击是{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，该目标会旋转180度。该名敌人对刺客攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}会降低至0，效果持续至该名敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
- 如果此次攻击为{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，目标将会前往3格距离内的最近格子。此格子在面向刺客的方向没有邻近{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}。此次移动会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的下次单体攻击会遭受-50%的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，最低可降至0%，但获得10点{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}加成。
- <indent=5%>如果此次攻击为{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，该目标会旋转180度。该名敌人对刺客攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}会降低至0，效果持续至该名敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果此次攻击为{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，目标将会前往3格距离内的最近格子，且此格子在面向刺客的方向不会有邻近{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}。此次移动会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
El próximo ataque del asesino dirigido contra un único objetivo tendrá una penalización de −50 % a la penetración de armadura (con un mínimo de 0 % de penetración de armadura) y recibirá un +10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Si se trata de un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, el objetivo rota 180 grados. Las puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del enemigo contra los ataques del asesino se reducen al 0 % hasta el comienzo del próximo turno de ese enemigo.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si se trata de un ataque a distancia, el objetivo se ve obligado a moverse a la casilla más próxima a una distancia máxima de 3 casillas en la que no haya {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} adyacente y queda orientado hacia el asesino. Este movimiento provoca ataques de oportunidad.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El próximo ataque del asesino dirigido contra un único objetivo tendrá una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} (con un mínimo de 0 % de penetración de armadura) y recibirá un +10 a la letalidad.
- Si se trata de un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el objetivo rota 180 grados. Las puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del enemigo contra los ataques del asesino se reducen a 0 hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de ese enemigo.
- Si se trata de un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, el objetivo se ve obligado a moverse a la casilla más próxima a una distancia máxima de 3 casillas en la que no haya {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} adyacente y queda orientado hacia el asesino. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text:
Der nächste Einzelziel-Angriff des Assassinen hat einen Rüstungsdurchdringungs-Abzug von −50 %, mit einem Minimum von 0 % Rüstungsdurchdringung und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Wenn es sich um einen Nahkampfangriff handelt, dreht sich das Ziel um 180 Grad. Das {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} des Feindes gegen den Angriff des Assassinen entspricht 0 %, bis der Feind seinen Zug beginnt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wenn es sich um einen Fernkampfangriff handelt, wird sein Ziel gezwungen, sich auf das nächstgelegene Feld in einem Umkreis von 3 Feldern ohne angrenzende {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} zu bewegen, das dem Assassinen zugewandt ist. Diese Bewegung provoziert Überraschungsangriffe.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste Einzelziel-Angriff des Assassinen hat einen {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringungs-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Malus{/g} von -50%, mit einem Minimum von 0% Rüstungsdurchdringung und +10 Lethalität.
- Wenn es sich um einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} handelt, dreht sich das Ziel um 180 Grad. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} des Gegners gegen den Angriff des Assassinen ist gleich 0, bis der Gegner seine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} beginnt.
- Wenn es sich um einen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} handelt, wird sein Ziel gezwungen, sich auf das nächstgelegene Feld in einem Umkreis von 3 Feldern ohne angrenzende {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} zu bewegen, das dem Assassinen zugewandt ist. Diese Bewegung provoziert {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.

languages.text:
Lors de l'attaque à cible unique suivante de l'assassin, une pénalité de −50 % s'applique à sa pénétration d'armure, avec un minimum de 0 % de pénétration d'armure et une {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} de +10.
-<indent=5%>S'il s'agit d'une attaque de mêlée, la cible effectue une rotation de 180 degrés. L'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de l'ennemi contre l'attaque de l'assassin sont égales à 0 % jusqu'au début du tour de cet ennemi.</indent>
-<indent=5%>S'il s'agit d'une attaque à distance, la cible est contrainte de se déplacer vers la case la plus proche dans un rayon de 3 cases sans {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} adjacente face à l'assassin. Ce déplacement provoque des attaques d'opportunité.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Lors de l'attaque à cible unique suivante de l'Assassin, une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénalité{/g} de -50 % s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénétration d'armure{/g}, avec un minimum de 0 % de pénétration d'armure et une létalité de +10.
- S'il s'agit d'une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, la cible effectue une rotation de 180 degrés. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de l'ennemi contre l'attaque de l'Assassin sont égales à 0 jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de cet ennemi.
- S'il s'agit d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, la cible est contrainte de se déplacer vers la case la plus proche dans un rayon de 3 cases sans {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} adjacente face à l'Assassin. Ce déplacement provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text:
アサシンの次の単体対象攻撃はアーマー貫通ペナルティが−50%（最低値は0%）減少され、{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}が+10される。
-<indent=5%>それが近接攻撃の場合、ターゲットは180度回転する。アサシンの攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}は、敵のターン開始時まで0に等しくなる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>それが遠隔攻撃の場合、周囲3セル以内で、アサシンの方を向いている隣接する{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}のない、最も近くのセルへと強制的に移動させられる。この移動は機会攻撃を誘発する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
アサシンの次の単体対象攻撃はアーマー貫通ペナルティが−50%（最低値は0%）減少され、{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}が+10される。
-<indent=5%>それが近接攻撃の場合、ターゲットは180度回転する。アサシンの攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}は、敵のターン開始時まで0に等しくなる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>それが遠隔攻撃の場合、周囲3セル以内で、アサシンの方を向いている隣接する{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}のない、最も近くのセルへと強制的に移動させられる。この移動は機会攻撃を誘発する。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の次の単体対象攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が-50%（最低値は0%）され、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}が+10される。
-<indent=5%>それが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の場合、ターゲットは180度回転する。アサシンの攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}は、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで0に等しくなる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>それが{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の場合、周囲3セル以内で、アサシンの方を向いている隣接する{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽{/g}のない、最も近くのセルへと強制的に移動させられる。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。</indent>

languages.text:
Suikastçı'nın bir sonraki tek hedefli saldırısının zırh delme özelliği −%50 ceza puanı (minimum %0 zırh delme) ve +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} puanı alır.
-<indent=5%>Yakın dövüş saldırısıysa hedef 180 derece döner. Düşmanın Suikastçı'nın saldırılarına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri, düşmanın bir sonraki turunun başına dek %0'a iner.
-<indent=5%>Menzilli bir saldırıysa hedefi 3 hücre uzakta bulunan ve bitişiğinde Suikastçı'nın olduğu tarafa bakan {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} olmayan bir hücreye gitmeye zorlar. Bu hareket, fırsat saldırılarını tetikler.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>

languages.text:
The Assassin's next single-target attack will have a −50% armour penetration penalty, with a minimum of 0% armour penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
-<indent=5%>If it is a melee attack, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's turn.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it is a ranged attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity.</indent>
